pages.text: There seems to be something magical about the flow of time.$(br)This clock, formed from witnesses of time, is to show you a way in this never-ending stream of beginning and passing - moon phases.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)If we shadows have offended, Know but this and all is mended.$(br)That you have but slumbered here, While these visions did appear.$(br)And this weak and idle theme, No more yielding, but a dream.
